Now that Fluent 2012 has come to an end, O'Reilly has posted all the videos from the conference in a YouTube playlist. The whole playlist contains more than 50 videos, +5 hours of content. Not having been there is no longer an excuse to miss the talks!

Take your time and enjoy the great talks. This one by Brendan Eich was one of my favorites.

Link: Fluent 2012 playlist by O'Reilly
